articles.title: Asteroid 2020 GE to make close approach to Earth; Speed, size, proximity revealed by NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has revealed that a massive bus-size asteroid is on its way towards Earth and it will make a very close approach on September 8, 2023. It has been named Asteroid 2020 GE.
